title: Tales from Earthsea
writer: Ursula K. Le Guin, Gorô Miyazaki, Keiko Niwa
short_cast: Junichi Okada, Aoi Teshima, Bunta Sugawara, Yuko Tanaka, Teruyuki Kagawa, Jun Fubuki, Takashi Naito, Mitsuko Baisho, Yui Natsukawa, Kaoru Kobayashi

desc: As their world decays, an Archmage guides a troubled prince with a dark side on a journey to find the source of evil and save the women they love.
